description: If you are ready to live life in flow, doing what you love to do and getting paid for it, then this course is definitely for you! The trainer Shar Moore, a published Author, keynote Speaker and Mentor has been working with clients for years, to help them uncover their true purpose in life and has now developed this online course, taking you personally through each step of the process, to help you find your true purpose in life. Each week you will be guided through video and exercised that will show you the patterns in your life, that can lead you to your greatest gift. Perfect for any business owner wanting to really create amazing success!
title: Purpose Finder: Reveal Your True Purpose in Life and Prosper
